sentences.sContent: Some retailers worry that new regulations will hurt their ability to compete in the marketplace.
sentences.sCn: 有些零售商担心新规定会削弱他们的市场竞争力。

remMethod.val: market(市场) + place(地方) → 市场存在的地方 → 市集

words.tran: 市场的；可销售的；有销路的
[贸易] 市场商人；市场营销人员
出售；在市场上进行交易；使…上市（market的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: the part of business activity that is concerned with buying and selling goods in competition with other companies
